cards.text: Omni: Sacrifice Creed of Nurture. If you do, reveal a creature from your hand and choose a creature in play. For the remainder of the turn, the chosen creature gains the text box of the revealed creature.

cards.text: Play: Destroy each Scientist creature.

cards.text: Assault 3.While Eldest Bear is in the center of your battleline, it gains, “Before Fight: Gain 2A.”

cards.name: Fuzzy Gruen
cards.text: Play: Your opponent gains 1A.

cards.text: After a player chooses an active house, that player destroys an artifact of that house.

cards.name: Gravid Cycle
cards.text: Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.)Play: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Inka the Spider
cards.text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)Play/Reap: Stun a creature.

cards.name: Moor Wolf
cards.text: Skirmish.Play: Ready each other Wolf creature.

cards.text: Action: Stun a creature with power 5 or higher, or stun a Giant creature.

cards.text: Play: Destroy each elusive creature.

cards.text: Play/Reap: Deal 2D to each other creature.

cards.name: Po’s Pixies
cards.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)A stolen or captured from your pool is taken from the common supply instead.

cards.name: Punctuated Equilibrium
cards.text: Play: Each player discards their hand, then refills their hand as if it were the end of their turn.

cards.name: Quicksand
cards.text: Play: Destroy the most powerful creature controlled by each player who does not control a ready Untamed creature.

cards.name: Roxador
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)Roxador only deals 2D when fighting.Fight: Stun the attacked creature.

th.name: ร็อกซาดอร์

cards.name: Teliga
cards.text: Each time your opponent plays a creature, gain 1A.

th.name: เทลิกา

cards.name: Vineapple Tree
cards.text: Keys cost +1A for each growth counter on Vineapple Tree. After a player forges a key, remove each growth counter from Vineapple Tree. Action: Put a growth counter on Vineapple Tree.

th.name: ต้นแอปเปิลเถาวัลย์

cards.name: Witch of the Wilds
cards.text: During each turn in which Untamed is not your active house, you may play one Untamed card.

th.name: แม่มดแห่งพงไพร

cards.name: Xenos Bloodshadow
cards.text: Elusive. Hazardous 6. Poison. Skirmish.

cards.name: Toad
cards.text: Toad cannot reap.

th.name: คางคก

cards.name: Ghostform
cards.text: This creature gains invulnerable. (It cannot be destroyed or dealt damage.)This creature gains, “Fight/Reap: Archive Ghostform.”

th.name: ร่างวิญญาณ

cards.name: Infomancer
cards.text: Elusive.Play: Graft an action card from your hand onto Infomancer. (Place it faceup under this card.)Reap: Trigger the play effect of an action card grafted onto Infomancer.

th.name: อินโฟแมนเซอร์

cards.name: Lateral Shift
cards.text: Play: Look at your opponent’s hand. Play a card from that hand as if it were yours.

th.name: ท่องมิติคู่ขนาน

cards.name: Memolith
cards.text: Action: Graft an action card from your hand onto Memolith (place it faceup under this card), or trigger the play effect of an action card grafted onto Memolith.

th.name: เมมโมลิธ

cards.name: Nizak, The Forgotten
cards.text: While fighting, Nizak, The Forgotten gains invulnerable. (It cannot be destroyed or dealt damage.)After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Nizak, The Forgotten, return that creature to its owner’s hand.

th.name: นิซแซคผู้ถูกลืม

cards.name: Orb of Wonder
cards.text: Omni: Sacrifice Orb of Wonder. If you do, search your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

th.name: ลูกแก้วมหัศจรรย์

cards.name: The Grim Reaper
cards.text: If you are haunted, The Grim Reaper enters play ready. (You are haunted if there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile.)Reap: Purge an enemy creature and a friendly creature.

th.name: กริมรีปเปอร์

cards.name: The Red Baron
cards.text: While your red key is forged, The Red Baron gains, “Reap: Steal 1A.” While your opponent’s red key is forged, The Red Baron gains elusive.

th.name: บารอนแดง

cards.name: Timequake
cards.text: Play: Shuffle each friendly card in play into your deck. Draw a card for each card shuffled into your deck this way.

th.name: มิติเวลาสั่นสะเทือน

cards.name: Valoocanth
cards.text: While the tide is low, Valoocanth cannot be used. (By default, the tide is neither high or low.)Fight/Reap: Exhaust an enemy creature and each of its neighbors.

th.name: วาลูแคนธ์
